ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) loaf French bread, halved lengthwise

cookingTips: Infuse butter with garlic slowly over low heat to avoid burning
Toast bread cut-side down for crispness
Brush generously with garlic butter immediately after toasting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This simple side requires patience with the garlic infusion. Want tips on preventing garlic from burning?
